ai.question: What information can be found by using the command show mac-address-table on a Cisco Catalyst switch?

choice.text: the MAC addresses of the ports on the Catalyst switch
the port the switch will use to forward frames to a host
the IP addresses of directly connected network devices
the mapping between MAC address and IP address for network hosts

ai.question: While troubleshooting a network problem, the network adminstrator issues the show version command on a router. What information can be found using this command?

choice.text: the amount of NVRAM, DRAM, and flash memory installed on the router
the bandwidth, encapsulation, and I/O statistics on the interfaces
differences between the backup configuration and the current running configuration
the version of the routing protocols running on the router

ai.question: After gathering a thorough list of network applications, the traffic generated by these applications, and the priority of this traffic, a network engineer wishes to integrate this information into a single document for analysis. How can this be accomplished?

choice.text: Create a physical topology map of the network and annotate it with the network application data.
Create a logical topology map of the network and annotate it with the network application data.
Create a blueprint of the facility, including network cabling and telecommunications rooms, and annotate it with the network application data.
Take a photograph of the facility, and annotate it with the network application data.

ai.question: One evening a network adminstrator attempted to access a recently deployed website and received a "page not found" error. The next day the adminstrator checked the web server logs and noticed that during the same hour that the site failed to load, there were hundreds of requests for the web site home page. All of the requests originated from the same IP address. Given this information, what might the network administrator conclude?

choice.text: It is normal web surfing activity.
It is likely that someone attempted a DoS attack.
The link to the web site does not have enough capacity and needs to be increased.
The web server was turned off and was not able to service requests.

ai.question: What type of media typically connects an MDF switch to an IDF switch in another building?
Which three devices can receive power over the same twisted pair Ethernet cable that carries data? (Choose three.)

ai.question: Which two protocols can be used to access a Cisco router for in-band management? (Choose two.)

A network analyst is documenting the existing network at ABC Corporation. The analyst decides to start at the core router to identify and document the Cisco network devices attached to the core. Which command executed on the core router provides the required information?
